__More flexible designs in Shiny__

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_knit$set(base_dir = "/", base.url = "/")
opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE,
  fig.path = "stat679_notes/assets/week3-3/"
  )
```
